Fiction.author: George Orwell
Fiction.description: A classic that makes me scared.

Fantasy.title: The Way of Kings
Fantasy.author: Brandon Sanderson
Fantasy.description: This is a the ultimate choice for fans of epic fantasy. The world is immense, meticulously crafted, and consistent.

Fantasy.title: The Will of The Many
Fantasy.author: James Inslington
Fantasy.description: Best book I've read this year. An intense story following a single perspective of a lad trying to make his father proud.

Fantasy.title: The Licanius Trilogy
Fantasy.author: James Inslington
Fantasy.description: One of the most satisfying endings to a trilogy. High stakes, many moving pieces, and time manipulation to make things even more interesting.

Biograhies.title: Benjamin Franklin
Biograhies.author: Walter Isaacson
Biograhies.description: The only person with his name on all four foundational documents that created the United States of America. An inventor, writer, leader, and businessman. Benjamin Franklin is one of a kind.

Biograhies.title: Surely You're Joking Mr. Feynman
Biograhies.author: Richard Feynman
Biograhies.description: A collection of fun and fasinating stories from the life of Richard Feynman, written by Richard Feynman. Known for his excellence as a physics professor and spunk as a human. Loved reading this.
